channel.title: Entire MYSQL DB for items.... (w/ tutorial on 3rd post)
channel.description:
I spent the last fucking 12Hours doing this..... [edited on 10/3/08: found out i waisted my time... I could of made a javasource to implement this sql from the .cfg file itself lol.... still same results thou, and it's not completely invain ^_^ ] ENJOY! LEECH IT W00TZ ^_^
Find the tutorial Here: http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,309094.0.html
This is just a file to add to MySQL everything that appears in items.cfg this would be useful if you were going to be making a utility tool like .php to update items from a remote location.
Next, for up for wasting my time, NPC's and shops and dialogue lol.....
If you don't know what this is for, don't even waist your time asking lol...... People who this will help can find it with a search bar =)
This would be useful like for a sorting device by last update or to sort by a specific attribute.... :) If you notice, I added the update column half way of adding the code ...... I think, but it will still get the job done for it's purpose...... Half of the items are last update 0000-00-00 00:00:00 lol
The sql file is located at: http://Sonis.tv/itemscfg.sql.txt Oh, and the files here are to connect to MySQL: http://Sonis.tv/org.zip Don't dare ask for a virus scan on a .txt file!
